Talentbento

Working with the right people

About Us

We started out as people without borders. Realized it is hard to find work with like minded employers that does not mind hiring without discrimination, with least effort possible without either the employer or us spending a lot of times to search for right jobs. want to ensure privacy when we are ready to move on with our lives.

Non Discrimination

We try to make our service as non discriminatory as possible. Removing things like race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status.

No Fuss

We understand sometimes, we may not hire the best talents. But it may do good to the industry to hire talents that are stable. Does the company good, and the talent good. We uses the stable marriage algorithm to sort the most stable candidate match.

Discrete

We do not advertise job postings or talent's intention to seek jobs. Keeping you intentions a privacy. We know, job changing or job seeking is a tricky as it involves risk.

Who is this for?

Companies

Companies looking to hire awesome talents.

Talents

Talents looking to work in great companies.
